article: Surya Vamsi Samachar January 2017 Edition can be accessed online by Clicking here
Your queries related to the matrimony app answered. Click here to view them.

4G Labs has enabled free registration of Are-Katika brides/grooms through the app. The profiles shall be shared with Samaj heads who shall review and help the submitter with the matched profiles. Upgrade your app to the latest version and start submitting through the new Matrimony option added to the menu

Click here to upgrade to the latest version.
